answers.answer: Hopefully  everything  goes  good with ur delivery  hope she doesnt have to go to the nicu either prayers will be sent out ur way

question: At the hospital now about to start my induction 35 weeks 5 days developed preeclampsia over the past few days And she's still measuring small so they want to go ahead and take her I'm gonna get to meet my little girl soon I hope she does good I don't want her to have to go to the nicu I'll keep you posted
title: gonna meet my little girl soon!!!!!
